attributes.action: Enforce stricter rules in schools to deal with Bullying
attributes.additional_details: School won’t listen as it’s extra work for them but will have to do it if the government put pressure on them.
attributes.background: At the moment loads of kids are bullied in school and generally the bullies get away with it, I want to change that, I want school to have to deal with cases of bullying and for there to be punishments for bullying.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Schools already have a duty to deal with bullying.  You might like to sign these petitions

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319943
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560462
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

For information and advice about bullying, you can find more information at sites such as https://www.nationalbullyinghelpline.co.uk/
